use_cases_desc: Collaborative games in a museum (i.e. quiz, associations, hidden word, chronology, detail)
contribution_desc: An MDE to support cooperation among museum visitors through games. PDAs are used for the individual gameplay and public displays for synchronized public views of the shared gameplay. The game facilitates group-based learning of museum artworks. A small-scale qualitative user study with 11 participants give insights into the user experience of--at that time novel--multi-device interfaces
tracking_accuracy: identifies devices present in a room
